item.title: Citizen Science Soil Collection Program
item.description: Citizen Science Soil Collection Program View the project here. Overview The key to the next life-saving biomedical discovery might be living right below your feet. Dozens of fungi can occupy a single handful of soil and many of them are adept at making new compounds called natural products. These remarkable molecules hold tremendous promise for treating human diseases. It only takes a few minutes to help by collecting a scoop of soil.
